Translations.Text: Caro mardumi hec dehae, ʙa hangome ki imonasom naf'ason msdod, imon najovardand. magar qavmi Junus, ki cun imon ovardand, azoʙi xori dar dunjoro az onon ʙardostem va to hangome ki acalason faro rasid, az zindagi ʙarxurdorason kardem
Agar Parvardigori tu ʙixohad, hamai kasone, ki dar rui zaminand, imon meovarand. Ojo tu mardumro macʙur mekuni, ki imon ʙijovarand
Be xosti Xudo hec kasro narasad, ki imon ʙijovarad. Va palidiro ʙar kasone, ki xiradi xud ʙa kor nameʙarand, muqarrar mekunad
Bigu: «Bingared, ki ci cizhoe dar osmonhovu zamin ast!» Va in ojotu husdorho qavmero, ki imon nameovarand, naf' namekunad
Intizori ruzero mekasand monandi ruzhoe, ki pesinijonason muntaziras ʙudand? Bigu; «Intizor ʙikased, ki man niz ʙo sumo muntaziram!»
On goh pajomʙaronamon va kasonero, ki imon ovardaand, merahonem. Zero ʙar Mo fariza ast, ki mu'minonro ʙirahonem
Bigu: «Ej mardum, agar sumo dar dini man sak dored, man cizhoero, ki ʙa coi Olloh meparasted, nameparastam. Man Ollohro meparastam, ki sumoro memironad va amr sudaam, ki az mu'minon ʙosam!»
Va ʙa dini pok ruj ovar va az musrikon maʙos
Ba coi Olloh xudojonero, ki na ʙa tu sud merasonand va na zijon, maxon. Agar cunin kuni, az sitamkoron xohi ʙud
